description: Log_2 of denominators of coefficients in function a(x) such that a(a(x)) = exp(x) - 1.
references: R. P. Stanley, Enumerative Combinatorics, Cambridge, Vol. 2, 1999; see Problem 5.52.
mathematica: T[n_, n_] = 1; T[n_, m_] := T[n, m] = (StirlingS2[n, m]*m!/n! - Sum[T[n, i]*T[i, m], {i, m+1, n-1}])/2; Table[n!*T[n, 1] // Denominator // Log[2, #]&, {n, 0, 29}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Mar 03 2014, after A052104 and _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 23 2000
